Piercing: Piercing: Grants 350 Offensive Penetration per stage.
Flawless Ritual: Flawless Ritual: Increases your chance to apply a Magical status effect by 30% per stage.
Battle Mastery: Battle Mastery: Increases your chance to apply a Martial status effect by 30% per stage.
War Mage:
War Mage: Grants 100 Weapon and Spell Damage to Magical attacks.

Affects Magic, Flame, Frost, and Shock Damage.
Mighty:
Mighty: Grants 100 Weapon and Spell Damage to Martial attacks.

Affects Physical, Poison, Disease, and Bleed Damage.
Weapons Expert: Weapons Expert: Increases your damage done with Light and Heavy Attacks by 4% per stage.
Force of Nature: Force of Nature: Increases your Offensive Penetration by 660 for every status effect your target has.
Exploiter: Exploiter: Increases your damage done against Off Balance enemies by 2% per stage.
Blessed: Blessed: Increases your Healing Done by 1% per stage.
Salve of Renewal: Salve of Renewal: Whenever you remove a harmful effect from yourself or an ally, you sanctify the ground beneath them and heal them and allies within 8 meters for 1280 Health per stage. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
Hope Infusion:
Hope Infusion: Healing yourself or an ally under 50% Health grants them Minor Heroism for 1 second for every 300 Magicka Recovery you have. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds per target.

Current duration: 1.5 seconds
From the Brink: From the Brink: Whenever you heal yourself or an ally under 25% Health, you grant them a damage shield that absorbs up to 2200 damage per stage, for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 30 seconds per target.
Enlivening Overflow: Enlivening Overflow: Overhealing yourself or an ally grants them Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery equal to .5% of your Max Magicka, up to a cap of 150, for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds per target.
Resilience: Resilience: Grants 132 Critical Resistance per stage.
Preparation: Preparation: Reduces your damage taken from non-player attacks by 5% per stage.
Elemental Aegis:
Elemental Aegis: Reduces the damage you take from Magical attacks by 1% per stage.

Affects Magic, Flame, Frost, and Shock Damage.
Hardy:
Hardy: Reduces the damage you take from Martial attacks by 1% per stage.

Affects Physical, Poison, Disease, and Bleed Damage.
Quick Recovery: Quick Recovery: Increases your healing received by 1% per stage.
Ironclad: Ironclad: Reduces your damage taken by direct damage attacks by 3% per stage.
Arcane Supremacy: Arcane Supremacy: Increases Max Magicka by 26 per stage.
Backstabber: Backstabber: Increases your Critical Damage done by 2% per stage against enemies you are flanking.
Biting Aura: Biting Aura: Increases your damage done with area of effect attacks by 3% per stage.
Bulwark: Bulwark: While you have a Shield or Frost Staff equipped, your Spell and Physical Resistance is increased by 1900.
Cleansing Revival: Cleansing Revival: Healing a target under 25% Health removes all harmful effects from them. This effect can occur once every 24 seconds.
Cutting Defense: Cutting Defense: You deal 0 Magic Damage to attackers whenever they damage you with a direct damage attack within 7 meters. This effect scales off the higher of your Physical or Spell Resistance and can activate your Weapon Enchantments and Poisons.
Deadly Aim: Deadly Aim: Increase your damage done with single target attacks by 3% per stage.
Duelist's Rebuff: Duelist's Rebuff: Reduces your damage taken by single target attacks by 3% per stage.
Eldritch Insight: Eldritch Insight: Grants 260 Max Magicka per stage.
Endless Endurance: Endless Endurance: Increases your Max Stamina by 26 per stage.
Enduring Resolve: Enduring Resolve: Reduces your damage taken by damage over time attacks by 3% per stage.
Fighting Finesse: Fighting Finesse: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing done by 4% per stage.
Focused Mending: Focused Mending: Increases your Healing Done with single target heals by 2% per stage.
Foresight: Foresight: After you drink a potion, the cost of your Magicka and Stamina healing abilities used within 6 seconds are reduced by 75%.
Last Stand: Last Stand: When you take damage below 20% Health you gain Major Heroism, granting 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds for 9 seconds. This effect can occur once every 9 seconds.
Master-at-Arms: Master-at-Arms: Increases your damage done with direct damage attacks by 3% per stage.
Occult Overload: Occult Overload: Whenever you kill an enemy under the effect of a status effect, they violently explode for 1037 Oblivion Damage per stage to all other enemies in a 4 meter radius, and applying a random status effect to each enemy hit. This effect can occur once every second.
Precision: Precision: Grants 160 Critical Chance per stage.
Reaving Blows: Reaving Blows: When you deal direct damage you heal for 7% of the damage done.
Reinforced: Reinforced: When you begin Bracing, you gain a damage shield that absorbs 5140 damage for 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
Rejuvenator: Rejuvenator: Grants 41 Weapon and Spell Damage to your healing abilities per stage.
Riposte: Riposte: When you block an attack from an enemy within 7 meters, your next direct damage attack made within 5 seconds deals 33% additional damage. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
Soothing Tide: Soothing Tide: Increases your Healing Done by area of effect heals by 2% per stage.
Swift Renewal: Swift Renewal: Increases your Healing Done with healing over time effects by 2% per stage.
Thaumaturge: Thaumaturge: Increases your damage done with damage over time effects by 3% per stage.
Tireless Discipline: Tireless Discipline: Grants 260 Max Stamina per stage.
Unassailable: Unassailable: Reduces your damage taken by area of effect attacks by 3% per stage.
Untamed Aggression: Untamed Aggression: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 3 per stage.
Wrathful Strikes: Wrathful Strikes: Grants 41 Weapon and Spell Damage to your damaging abilities per stage.
Mystic Tenacity: Mystic Tenacity: Reduces the duration of Elemental Status Effects applied to you by 5% per stage.
Sustained by Suffering: Sustained by Suffering: Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery by 30 per stage while under the effects of a negative effect.
Relentlessness: Relentlessness: Being Stunned or Feared causes you to gain Major Protection for 3 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 10%.
Pain's Refuge: Pain's Refuge: Reduces your damage taken by 2% for every 2 negative effects active on you, up to a maximum of 20%.
Nimble Protector: Nimble Protector: Increases your Movement Speed while Bracing by 3% per stage.
Ward Master: Ward Master: Reduces your damage taken by 2% per stage while Blocking and under the effects of a Damage Shield.
Bracing Anchor: Bracing Anchor: While in combat, increase the amount of damage you can block by 4% per stage, but reduces your Movement Speed by 16% at all stages.
Soothing Shield: Soothing Shield: When you successfully block an attack you have a 15% chance to restore 147 Health per stage.
Hasty: Hasty: Increases your movement speed when Sprinting by 2% per stage.
Celerity: Celerity: Increases your Movement Speed by 2% per stage.
Refreshing Stride: Refreshing Stride: While Sprinting you gain 100 Health and Magicka Recovery per stage.
Thrill of the Hunt: Thrill of the Hunt: Whenever you kill an enemy you gain Major Expedition for 3 seconds per stage, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.
Arcane Alacrity: Arcane Alacrity: While under the effects of a damage shield your Roll Dodge costs 160 less Stamina per stage.
Bashing Brutality: Bashing Brutality: Increases your Bash damage by 60 per stage.
Bastion: Bastion: Increases the effectiveness of your damage shields and damage against shielded enemies by 3% per stage.
Bloody Renewal: Bloody Renewal: Restore 300 Stamina per stage, whenever you kill an enemy.
Boundless Vitality: Boundless Vitality: Grants 28 Max Health per stage.
Defiance: Defiance: Reduces the cost of Break Free by 110 Stamina per stage.
Expert Evasion: Expert Evasion: Your next Roll Dodge is free of cost. After consuming this effect, you cannot gain it again for 30 seconds.
Fortification: Fortification: Increases the amount of damage you can block by 2% per stage.
Hardened: Hardened: Increases the duration of Crowd Control Immunity by 3% per stage.
Hero's Vigor: Hero's Vigor: Grants 280 Max Health per stage.
Juggernaut: Juggernaut: While under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity, you take 1% less damage per stage.
On Guard: On Guard: While under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity, increases the amount of damage you block by 2% per stage.
Peace of Mind: Peace of Mind: Increases Magicka and Health Recovery while under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity by 40 per stage.
Piercing Gaze: Piercing Gaze: Increases your Stealth Detection by 1 meter per stage.
Rejuvenation: Rejuvenation: Grants 1.8 Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery per stage.
Rousing Speed: Rousing Speed: Reduces the cost of Sprint by 50 Stamina per stage, while under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity.
Savage Defense: Savage Defense: Reduces the cost of Bash by 45 Stamina per stage.
Shield Master: Shield Master: Reduces the cost of your damage shield abilities by 2% per stage.
Siphoning Spells: Siphoning Spells: Restore 300 Magicka per stage, whenever you kill an enemy.
Slippery: Slippery: When you are affected by a disabling effect, you automatically Break Free for no cost. After using this effect, you become Winded and cannot trigger this effect or others like it for 21 seconds.
Spirit Mastery: Spirit Mastery: Decreases the time it takes to resurrect an ally by 33%.
Sprinter: Sprinter: Reduces the cost of Sprint by 20 Stamina per stage.
Strategic Reserve: Strategic Reserve: Gain 30 Health Recovery for every 10 Ultimate you have.
Survival Instincts: Survival Instincts: While afflicted with a Status Effect, your core combat skills cost 5% less per stage.
Tempered Soul: Tempered Soul: Return to life after resurrection with 5% more resources per stage.
Tireless Guardian: Tireless Guardian: Reduces the cost of Block by 20 Stamina per stage.
Tumbling: Tumbling: Reduces the cost of Roll Dodge by 120 Stamina per stage.
Unchained: Unchained: When you use Break Free, the cost of your next Stamina ability used within 5 seconds is reduced by 11% per stage.
Angler's Instincts: Angler's Instincts: Increases your chance of catching higher quality fish, akin to fishing with another player. This effect can stack with other similar bonuses.
Breakfall: Breakfall: Reduces your fall damage taken by 7% per stage.
Cutpurse's Art: Cutpurse's Art: Increases the chance to get higher-quality loot when pickpocketing.
Discipline Artisan: Discipline Artisan: Increases experience gain for currently active skills and their skill lines by 3% per stage.
Fade Away: Fade Away: Escaping from a Guard wipes 25% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.
Fleet Phantom: Fleet Phantom: Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak by 5% per stage.
Fortune's Favor: Fortune's Favor: Increases the amount of gold you find in treasure chests and safeboxes by 10% per stage.
Friends in Low Places:
Friends in Low Places: Removes 1000 gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.

You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than 1000 gold.
Gifted Rider: Gifted Rider: Increases your Mount Speed by 2% per stage.
Gilded Fingers: Gilded Fingers: Increases your gold gained by 2% per stage.
Homemaker: Homemaker: You have a 10% chance to find a second furnishing plan whenever you find a furnishing plan in the world.
Infamous: Infamous: Increases the value of fenced items by 25%.
Inspiration Boost: Inspiration Boost: Increases your crafting inspiration gained by 10% per stage.
Liquid Efficiency: Liquid Efficiency: Whenever you use a potion or poison you have a 10% chance to not consume it.
Master Gatherer: Master Gatherer: Reduces the time it takes to harvest by 10% per stage.
Meticulous Disassembly: Meticulous Disassembly: Improves the chances of extracting Woodworking, Blacksmithing, Clothing, and Jewelry Crafting ingredients and allows the refining of more powerful resins, tempers, tannins, and platings from raw materials.
Out of Sight: Out of Sight: Reduces the radius you can be detected while Sneaking by 1 meter per stage.
Plentiful Harvest: Plentiful Harvest: You have a 10% chance to gain double the yield from normal resource nodes per stage.
Professional Upkeep: Professional Upkeep: Reduces the cost of repairing your armor by 1% per stage.
Rationer: Rationer: Adds 10 minutes to the duration of any food or drink that increases your character's stats per stage.
Reel Technique: Reel Technique: Decreases the time it takes for a fish to bite by 25%.
Shadowstrike: Shadowstrike: When you kill an enemy with Blade of Woe, you become invisible for 5 seconds after a short delay while distracting nearby enemies or potential witnesses. While under this effect you can cast Blade of Woe.
Soul Reservoir: Soul Reservoir: When you resurrect yourself or another player you have a 33% chance to not consume a Soul Gem.
Steadfast Enchantment: Steadfast Enchantment: Your Weapon Enchantments have a 10% chance to not consume a charge when activated per stage.
Steed's Blessing: Steed's Blessing: Increases your out of combat Movement Speed by .4% per stage.
Sustaining Shadows: Sustaining Shadows: Reduces the cost of Sneak by 1% per stage.
Treasure Hunter: Treasure Hunter: Increase the quality of items you find in treasure chests.
Wanderer: Wanderer: Reduces the cost of Wayshrine usage by 10% per stage.
War Mount: War Mount: Improves your mastery with mounts, removing all mount Stamina costs outside of combat.
